name: raspadmin
text:
raspadmin install and set hostname
SSL cert info:
Country Name (2 letter code):%1
State or Province Name:%2
Locality Name (eg, city):%3
Set hostname to:%4
URL for web interface
https://hostname:443
shortDescription: Install a web interface and change the hostname for the Raspberry Pi.
longDescription: Install a web interface and change the hostname for the Raspberry Pi. This will install sevral extra compenents that are needed, a SSL cert will also be created for you
